short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly find and save your professor from your college on Rate My Professor!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply select the text containing the professor's name and right click to open up the context menu, where you can then click to find your professor! 

Bookmark professors to save them to your extension library to easily access them again. 

Reach out for update suggestions and more schools!

Current Schools:
UMass Amherst
UMass Lowell
Boston University
Northeastern University
